web-production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
web-production.post-deploy: npm install ; grunt compile --sites=emerging-citizens ; pm2 restart 0 -- emerging-citizens --env production

web-staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
web-staging.post-deploy: npm i ; grunt compile --sites=emerging-citizens ; pm2 restart 0 -- emerging-citizens --env staging

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking emerging-citizens and restarting app.';
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/current/ ; grunt compile --sites=emerging-citizens ; pm2 restart 0 -- emerging-citizens --env staging

production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking emerging-citizens and restarting app.';
production.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/current/; npm link /srv/emerging-citizens/current ; pm2 restart server.js -- emerging-citizens --env production
